thread.title: Women Are Clapping Back At Trump With The #DressLikeAWoman Hashtag
thread.title_full: Women Are Clapping Back At Trump With The #DressLikeAWoman Hashtag

author: Julie Gerstein
title: Women Are Clapping Back At Trump With The #DressLikeAWoman Hashtag
text:
View this image ›
Dave Kotinsky / Getty Images ID: 10464493 2. No official White House dress code has been publicized, but journalist Mike Allen spoke to a source from the Trump team who said “[the president] likes the women who work for him ‘to dress like women.’” View this image ›
John Parra / Getty Images “We hear that women who worked in Trump’s campaign field offices — folks who spend more time knocking on doors than attending glitzy events — felt pressure to wear dresses to impress Trump,” wrote Allen.
ID: 10464426 3. In response to the report, women created the Twitter hashtag #DressLikeAWoman to share what dressing “like a woman” looked like to them. View this image ›
Twitter: @drjudymelinek ID: 10464487 4. Academy Award winner Brie Larson took part. View this image ›
Twitter: @brielarson ID: 10464438 5. So did soldiers… View this image ›
Twitter: @knotty_nerd ID: 10464512 6. …HIV scientists… View this image ›
Twitter ID: 10464442 7. …and climate researchers. View this image ›
Twitter: @zarasocks ID: 10464447 8. California Senator Kamala Harris shared her own advice on how to #getthelook. View this image ›
Twitter: @KamalaHarris ID: 10464446 9. And female surgeons shared pics of them getting down to business in their work gear. View this image ›
Twitter: @BeckyAlleyneMD ID: 10464470 10. This welder showed off what she wears to work. View this image ›
Twitter: @lisaweir77 ID: 10464476 11. And this woman shared what her mother, a civil rights demonstrator, wore to resist. View this image ›
Twitter: @TananariveDue ID: 10464479 12. But one woman in particular offered some especially salient advice for how to #DressLikeAWoman: View this image ›
Twitter: @BethRader ID: 10464484
